title: Kit Movement and Usage Data
summary: This spreadsheet contains multiple sheets detailing the movement and usage of medical kits across various plants and hospitals. The 'Summary' and 'Kit Movement' sheets provide an overview of standard and non-standard usage balances. The 'Kit Usage' sheet includes detailed data on kit usage by brand and plant, while the 'Turn Rates - Brand' sheet analyzes usage and invoiced cases, placement usage, and turn rates for different hospital categories. The 'FAE Table' sheet provides a comprehensive breakdown of usage and invoiced cases by plant and brand, including calculations for hospital usage counts and placement totals.
